messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Was: The EVILS of  Exercises for Mindful Parenting, ...
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 2/3/03 6:37:41 AM Pacific Standard Time, ... Kelli, they will.  I ve have of the dearest friends now.  A couple of them share my beliefs
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 2/3/03 6:37:41 AM Pacific Standard Time,
kellitraas@... writes:


> Kris,
>
> it is sad and it is hard, I know how you are feeling. Lots of transition
> around our circle of friends too. I just keep hoping that as these
> friends go, new ones will come that will be more accepting and similar in
> their parenting styles.
>
>
>
> Kelli
>

Kelli, they will. I've have of the dearest friends now. A couple of them
share my beliefs about God and some don't, we respect our differences. It
took some time but they are the best and worth the wait.

Kris


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
